body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Dealership Support. My name is Ryan Davis. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Rachel Scott.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Rachel. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit relieved. I recently had some issues with the customer service at one of your branches.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Rachel. To assist you better, could you please provide me with the location and date of the incident?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The incident occurred at the downtown branch on Elm Street last week.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Rachel. Can you also provide me with your contact number so that our team can investigate further?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five - two one zero - nine six eight four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing the details, Rachel. Our team will look into this matter promptly. Is there anything else you'd like to add before we proceed?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Rachel. Thank you for bringing this to our attention and for your time. We will reach out to you soon with an update. Have a great day!
